attributes.action: Stop Discriminating Pakistan and remove Pakistan from Red List.
attributes.additional_details:
According to data from the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC), Pakistan’s rate of Covid cases per 100,000 residents over the past 14 days is 21.72; India’s is currently almost double that, at 39.98.

India was added to Amber List only to get Political gains.
attributes.background: Stop Discriminating Pakistan and remove Pakistan from Red List.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Remove Pakistan from red list for travel
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581974
